channel.title: Comments on: Checked in new codes

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I think ... I should rename those identifiers with Ada style, while leaving those Windows definitions still in Windows style.
Current codes look a little bit weird, Ada program with lots of C/C++ styles around ...
item.content:encoded:
I think … I should rename those identifiers with Ada style, while leaving those Windows definitions still in Windows style.

Current codes look a little bit weird, Ada program with lots of C/C++ styles around …
